description: Ministry of State for Foreign Affairs - Supporting Implementation of Bahrain’s Universal Periodic Report (UPR) and  Action Plan

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: The project, which covers the year 2008-2012, focuses on the following areas: 1) strengthening Bahrain’s human rights database and information system; 2) effective implementation of Bahrain’s obligations under international human rights treaties; 3) strengthening Bahrain’s capacities for applying a human rights based approach to development; 4) strengthening Bahrain’s institutions for the protection and promotion of human rights; and 5) strengthening Bahrain’s human rights normative framework.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Bahrain UPR implementation
